Pre-Game Insights: Angels manager Ron Washington mentioned that Caden Dana earned his spot in the starting lineup due to his performance in the minor leagues and expressed excitement about his debut against the Mariners. Samuel Aldegheri was also recalled and expected to pitch in the series opener against Seattle, with Washington looking forward to evaluating both prospects in the context of the team's future
Miscellaneous Highlights: Samuel Aldegheri is the first Italian-born pitcher in MLB since 1950, adding historical context to the series
